```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
library(p8105.datasets)
data("ny_noaa")
my_data = 
  ny_noaa %>%
  separate(date,into = c("year","month","day"),sep = "-",convert = TRUE) %>%
  mutate(
    tmax = as.numeric(tmax)/10,
    tmin = as.numeric(tmin)/10,
    text_label = str_c("Snowfall: ", snow,"mm")) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  filter(snow != 0,
         year >= 2000) %>%
  select(id, year,snow,tmax,tmin,text_label)
my_data
```
```{r}
my_data %>%
  plot_ly( 
    x = ~tmin,
    y = ~tmax,
    color = ~snow,
    type = "scatter",
    mode = "markers",
    alpha = 0.6,
    text = ~text_label
    )
```

```{r}
my_data %>%
  filter(snow %in% 0:800) %>%
  plot_ly(
    y = ~snow,
    color = ~id,
    type = "box")
```
```{r}
my_data %>%
  count(id) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~id, y = ~n, type = "bar")
```
